name: psychedelically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
using bright colours and strange patterns associated (= connected) with the effects of taking certain drugs: A psychedelically painted hippie van was parked in front of the house. Each bedroom had been psychedelically decorated by its inhabitants.
using or experiencing the effects of psychedelic drugs (= ones that cause effects on the mind, such as powerful feelings or strong sense experiences): In the Sixties many people cultivated the self, psychedelically liberating it from the constraints of reality. He built a reputation as a psychedelically inclined liberal academic.
